extendedInfo.description: Jewels Grabber, The best special Jewels matching game !Jewels Grabber is an awesome evolution of classic casual game,  more exciting, more fantastic!  If you have got bored with other matching games , Jewels Grabber is for you.*** 2 Game Mode ***- Infinite Mode, The Casual Jewels Eliminating Mode.- Challenge Mode, Bring Challenge to you with game time limited.*** How To Play ***Touch the BLANK SPACE(not the Jewels itself) to grab Jewels. Those Jewels which are the same and located at the cross direction will be eliminated.*** SUPER Jewel ***Eliminate 3 Jewels to create SUPER Jewel. Once the SUPER Jewel is triggered, Jewels in 3x3 region will be cleared and triple bonus is given.*** HYPER Jewel ***Eliminate 4 Jewels to create HYPER Jewel. Once the HYPER Jewel is triggered, Jewels in the same row and column will be cleared and four times bonus is given.*** TRIGGER Special Jewel ***The SUPER Jewel and HYPER Jewel in yellow lines which generated by Eliminating Jewels will be triggered, or they are in the effect region of the previous triggered Special Jewel.Let's go and experience it.

reviews.title: The best yewel gam.
